newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech Pragobanka raises basic capital.
newsitem.headline: Czech Pragobanka raises basic capital.

text.p: Czech bank Pragobanka a.s. on Friday said it had raised its basic capital by 500 million crowns to 1.86 billion crowns through a share rights issue.

A Pragobanka official told Reuters the issue, conducted over two rounds, was subscribed to only by the bank's largest shareholder, insurer Ceska Pojistovna a.s. Pojistovna held an 83 percent stake in the bank before the issue.
He added that the PPF investment fund, which holds a 12 percent stake in Pragobanka, did not participate in the issue.
He did not elaborate, but did say that each share, which has a nominal value of 1,000 crowns, was sold at a 2,000 crown premium.
Pragobanka posted a pre-tax profit last year of 10 million crowns and had a balance sheet total of 18 billion crowns, according to preliminary results.
